posts.post_title: Old Judge Bobby Mathews SGC 40 4 Sale Price Reduction
posts.post_content:
Very Nice SGC 40 Bobby Mathews.

299 career wins, HoF?

One of the 100 most scarce OJ cards.

$1750 - 1500 - now 1250 and final drop.  Insured shipping included.

I am willing to listen to cash/ other OJ card trade offers.

[url]nkasarda@cs.com[/url]

Thanks!

Bruce Kasarda

posts.post_title: Old Judge Bobby Mathews SGC 40 4 Sale Price Cut
posts.post_content: Now 1500 and will listen to trades involving other Old Judge cards. Thanks
